local_intent: Lift the grasped lid vertically by 0.1 m along +z and confirm it remains held.
assumptions: A stable grasp on the lid has already been achieved.
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase: after verifying grasp stability, execute MoveDelta(z, 0.1, 1200) as in GLOBAL_BT and confirm retention with ObjectInGripper.
